page.title: 06HOUSING SURVEY CONTINUED
page.content: KEY: T=Terrace;S.D.=Semi-Detached; D=Detached;M=Maisonette. The most popular type of housing is the The most popular type of housing is the semi-detached found mainly on estates in the villages of Halmerend and Audley Terraced housing is also important and is found mainly in the centre of the two villages.They used to be miners houses when the pits were open.Some detached houses are found in Audley,but the majority were evenly spread through the 12 grid squares.Maisonettes were the most modern type of housing in our area and only found in Halmerend. The majority of housing was found in grid squares D & H which are the two main villages of Halmerend and Audley, the rest of our area is mainly farmland and accounts for the spread of detached (farm) housing in the area. S.Dodd,D.Johnson,T.Myott.
